If you are experiencing an error while adding your NIN for verification, please ensure that: Your NIN document is clear, valid, and in a supported format (PDF or JPG). The document is not expired and clearly shows your photo and details. The name on your NIN matches the name on your Proof of Address document. You can upload your documents directly through your myHF area or send them via email to backoffice@hfm.com for verification. If the error persists, please contact our support team for further assistance.

To verify your identity and recover your account, you may need to provide identification documents and confirm your registered details. Include your request and any relevant information to help us verify your identity. This process ensures your account security while restoring your access.

For identity verification on HFM, you need to provide the following documents: Proof of Identification: A current (not expired) colored scanned copy of your passport. If you don't have a valid passport, you can submit a similar photo ID such as a National ID card or Driving Licence. Proof of Address: A recent Bank Statement or Utility Bill (energy, water, telephone, gas bill) that is no older than 6 months. The document must clearly show your name and physical address. Important: The name on your Proof of Identification must exactly match the name on your Proof of Address. You can upload these documents directly in your myHF area or send them via email to backoffice@hfm.com. Verification usually takes up to 48 hours.

To update your email address registered with your HFM account, please follow these steps: Send a request **from your currently registered email address** to update your email. Include the **new email address** you want to use. If you no longer have access to your registered email, send the request **from your new email address** to the email provided on our **Contact Us** page. Attach the following for verification: A front and back copy of your registered ID document. A clear photo of yourself holding your registered ID document (both your face and the ID must be fully visible). Confirm your old email address. This process helps us verify your identity and update your email securely.

If you have a partner or referral code, you should enter the code provided to you by the person or entity who referred you. If you don't have a code, you can leave the field blank or check with your referrer for the correct code to use.

To apply for a withdrawal using virtual currency, please follow these steps: Log in to your myHF area (Client Area). Select Withdraw from the menu. Choose your preferred withdrawal method, including virtual currency options if available. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete your withdrawal request. Please note that all withdrawal requests are processed within 24 hours. If you have any issues or need to cancel a withdrawal, you can connect to a Live Agent for assistance. For more details on withdrawal options and processing times, you can visit our website by navigating to Trading > Pricing > Withdrawal Options.

If you are experiencing login problems with your trading account on MT5, please try the following troubleshooting steps: Ensure you are using the correct trading account number and trader's password. Select the correct server (hfmarkets) when logging in. Note that different account types display instruments with specific suffixes: Premium accounts (no suffix like EURUSD), Zero accounts ('b' suffix like EURUSDb), Pro accounts ('r' suffix like EURUSDr), Cent accounts ('c' suffix like EURUSDc). Verify your account is fully activated and documents are approved. Check your internet connection and try restarting the MT5 platform. Clear the app cache or try logging in from a different device. If you continue to experience issues, please contact our Live Agents for technical assistance.

If you are experiencing login problems with your trading account on MT5, please try the following troubleshooting steps: Ensure you are using the correct trading account number and trader's password. Select the correct server (hfmarkets) when logging in. Note that different account types display instruments with specific suffixes: Premium accounts (no suffix like EURUSD), Zero accounts ('b' suffix like EURUSDb), Pro accounts ('r' suffix like EURUSDr), Cent accounts ('c' suffix like EURUSDc). Verify your account is fully activated and documents are approved. Check your internet connection and try restarting the MT5 platform. Clear the app cache or try logging in from a different device. If you continue to experience issues, please contact our Live Agents for technical assistance.

To make a deposit into your myWallet, please follow these steps: Log in to your myHF area. On the left-hand side menu, click on Deposit. Select your preferred deposit method and follow the instructions on the screen. If you are using the HFM App: Tap on Menu. Then tap Deposit at the bottom of the screen. Choose any of the available deposit methods. You can deposit funds either into your myWallet or directly to an active Trading Account.

Unfortunately, once a trading account is archived, it cannot be reactivated or recovered. If you need to continue trading, you will need to create a new trading account through your myHF area by going to Trading Accounts > Open Live Account. If you have reached the maximum limit of live accounts, you may need to archive an existing account first to create space for a new one.

A Demo account is a practice trading account that uses virtual funds, allowing you to learn and test trading strategies without financial risk. It's perfect for beginners to familiarize themselves with the trading platform and market conditions before moving to live trading. For detailed features and to open a Demo account, please visit our website under Trading > Accounts or contact our Live Agents.

It's perfect for beginners to familiarize themselves with the trading platform and market conditions before moving to live trading. For detailed features and to open a Demo account, please visit our website under Trading > Accounts or contact our Live Agents.

A Live account is a real trading account that uses actual funds for trading in financial markets. It offers access to all trading instruments with real market conditions and the potential for actual profits and losses. Live accounts require verification and minimum deposits. For detailed features and account types, please visit our website under Trading > Accounts or contact our Live Agents.

A Micro account is designed for beginners and small-scale traders, offering smaller minimum deposits and trade sizes. It allows you to start trading with lower capital while learning the markets. Micro accounts typically have competitive spreads and are ideal for those new to forex trading. For detailed features and requirements, please visit our website under Trading > Accounts or contact our Live Agents.

A Premium account is designed for experienced traders who require advanced trading features and better conditions. A Zero Spread account offers spreads starting from 0.0 pips on major currency pairs, making it ideal for scalpers and high-frequency traders. For detailed features and requirements, please visit our website under Trading > Accounts or contact our Live Agents.

A Pro account is designed for professional and institutional traders who require the most advanced trading conditions. It offers the tightest spreads, highest leverage, priority customer support, and access to exclusive trading tools and market analysis. Pro accounts typically require substantial minimum deposits. For detailed features and requirements, please visit our website under Trading > Accounts or contact our Live Agents.

An Islamic account (also called Swap-Free account) is designed for Muslim traders who follow Sharia law. It eliminates overnight interest charges (swaps) on positions held past market close, complying with Islamic finance principles. Instead of swap, a small administration fee may apply to long-term positions. For detailed features and to request an Islamic account, please visit our website under Trading > Accounts or contact our Live Agents.

A Swap-Free account eliminates overnight interest charges (swaps) on positions held past market close, making it suitable for traders who follow Islamic finance principles or prefer to avoid swap charges. Instead of swap, a small administration fee may apply to long-term positions. For detailed features and to request a Swap-Free account, please visit our website under Trading > Accounts or contact our Live Agents.

A Cent account allows you to trade with cents instead of dollars, making it perfect for beginners who want to start with very small amounts. For example, $1 in a Cent account equals 100 cents, allowing for micro-trading with minimal risk. It's ideal for learning trading strategies and gaining experience without significant capital requirements. For detailed features and requirements, please visit our website under Trading > Accounts or contact our Live Agents.

A Copy account allows you to automatically copy trades from experienced and successful traders. You can browse trader profiles, view their performance history, and allocate funds to copy their strategies. You maintain control over risk settings and can stop copying anytime. It's perfect for beginners or those with limited time who want to benefit from expert trading strategies. For detailed features and setup, please visit our website under Trading > Accounts or contact our Live Agents.

A Social Trading account enables you to follow and copy trades from other traders in a social trading network. You can interact with other traders, share strategies, and automatically replicate successful trades. It combines social networking with trading, allowing you to learn from experienced traders while potentially earning profits. For detailed features and how to get started, please visit our website under Trading > Accounts or contact our Live Agents.

If your account status is still pending or under review, it usually means that your submitted documents are being verified. Verification typically takes 24-48 hours after you upload your documents. You have provided a proof of address (bank statement or utility bill) that is not older than 6 months. The name on both documents matches exactly. You can upload your documents directly through your myHF area or send them via email to backoffice@hfm.com. Once your documents are approved, your account will be fully activated, and you will be able to use all features, including deposits and trading.

If you cannot find the HfmarketsGlobal-Live5 server in your MT5, please try the following: Search for HFMarkets or HfmarketsGlobal in the server list, try typing the server name manually in the search box, or look for similar server names like HFMarkets-Live or HfmarketsGlobal-Live. If you still cannot find the correct server or continue to have login issues, please contact our Live Agents for assistance with the correct server details.

The withdrawal process involves two main steps: first, we review and process your withdrawal request, which usually takes up to 24 hours. After that, the time it takes for funds to appear in your bank account or e-wallet depends on the payment method you selected. Please note: Withdrawals are sent to the same card used for deposits within the last 6 months. HFM does not charge withdrawal fees, but some banks or payment processors might. If you need to cancel a withdrawal, you can connect to a Live Agent immediately, but cancellation may not be possible if the payment processor has already processed it. For faster updates, you can check your withdrawal status in your myHF area under My Wallet > Wallet Actions > Wallet Finances. If you experience unusual delays, feel free to contact our support team for assistance.

To correct the address for receiving payments and initiate a return, please send an email from your registered email address to backoffice@hfm.com with your new full residential address. Make sure to attach a valid Proof of Address document, such as a recent bank statement or utility bill, which should be no older than 6 months and clearly show your name and address. If you have already received payments to the incorrect address, please contact our Live Agent immediately for assistance with the return process. If you need further help, feel free to reach out!

To write an effective email to request help, please follow these guidelines: Send the email from your registered email address if your request is related to your account. Clearly state your request at the beginning of the email. Include all necessary details relevant to your request, such as your full name, account number, or any specific information needed for verification. Attach any required documents to support your request (e.g., ID copies, proof of address, or transaction receipts). Be polite and concise to help us assist you quickly. If you no longer have access to your registered email, send the request from your new email address and include verification documents like a front and back copy of your ID and a clear photo of you holding the ID. For specific requests, such as changing your email, phone number, or address, please include the relevant details and documents as required. You can find the appropriate contact email on our contact page: https://www.hfm.com/int/en/contact-us. This approach will help us verify your identity and process your request efficiently.

The time for your funds to appear depends on the payment method and processing times. If you encounter any error messages or delays, contacting your bank or payment provider may also help clarify the situation.

To sync your live trading account to MetaTrader 5 (MT5), please follow these steps: Open your MT5 platform. Click on Settings. Select New Account. Choose Login to an existing account. Type in hfmarkets and select the broker server. Enter your trading account number and trader's password. Select the appropriate server. Click on Sign in. This will connect your live trading account to MT5, allowing you to start trading.

To sync your live trading account to MetaTrader 5 (MT5), please follow these steps: Open your MT5 platform. Click on Settings. Select New Account. Choose Login to an existing account. Type in hfmarkets and select the broker server. Enter your trading account number and trader's password. Select the appropriate server. Click on Sign in. This will connect your live trading account to MT5, allowing you to start trading.

To close your HFM account, please follow these steps: First, withdraw all remaining funds from your account. Once your account balance is zero, send an email from your registered email address to the contact email provided on our Contact Us page: https://www.hfm.com/int/en/contact-us. In your email, confirm that you wish to close your HFM account and include the reason for your decision for feedback purposes. Please note that your account will be closed only after these steps are completed. If you need any further assistance, feel free to ask!

In your email, confirm that you wish to close your HFM account and include the reason for your decision for feedback purposes. Please note that your account will be closed only after these steps are completed. If you need any further assistance, feel free to ask!

Your account may not be verified because we require at least two documents to complete the verification process: A current, colored scanned copy of your Proof of Identification (passport, National ID card, or Driving licence). A Proof of Address document (such as a bank statement or utility bill) that is not older than 6 months and clearly shows your name and physical address. Please ensure that the name on both documents matches exactly. You can upload these documents directly from your myHF area or send them via email to backoffice@hfm.com. Once submitted, the verification department will review your documents within 48 hours. Verification must be completed before any deposits can be credited to your account.

If you want to make a deposit as a local depositor, please log in to your myHF area. On the left-hand side menu, click on Deposit, select your preferred deposit method, and follow the instructions on the screen. If you are using the HFM App, tap on Menu, then Deposit at the bottom of the screen, and choose any available method. You can deposit funds either into your myWallet or directly to an active Trading Account. If you encounter any issues or errors during the deposit, please contact your bank first. If the problem persists, you can email the Deposit Department at deposit@hfm.com with details or a screenshot of the issue for further assistance.

If you're having trouble uploading your Proof of Identification (POI) and Proof of Address (POA), you can try the following options: Upload your documents directly through your myHF area by logging in and following the upload instructions. Alternatively, you can scan your documents and send them via email to backoffice@hfm.com. Make sure your documents meet these requirements: POI must be a current, colored scanned copy of your passport, National ID card, or Driving licence. POA should be a recent bank statement or utility bill (not older than 6 months) showing your name and physical address clearly. The name on both documents must match exactly. Ensure the documents are in PDF or JPG format. If you continue to experience issues, please check your internet connection or try using a different browser or device. If the problem persists, feel free to contact our support team for further assistance.

Trading involves significant risks and profits are not guaranteed. Success in trading requires education, practice, and proper risk management. We recommend starting with a Demo account to practice your trading strategies without risking real money. You can also access educational resources and market analysis tools through your myHF area. Remember that you can lose more than your initial investment, so only trade with money you can afford to lose. For personalized guidance, you can speak to one of our Live Agents.
